original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 9.12. Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: mahantaraduka kusalattika

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na anārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nacittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanocittaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na cittam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na no cittam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nacetasikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na cetasikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭham na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta samuṭṭhānam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā pañca pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nocittasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta sahabhum na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Nocittānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…. Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: no citta anuparivattim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānam na kusala

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Naajjhattikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabāhiraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ajjhattikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na bāhiram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate nava

original: Naupādā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādāḥ na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Naupādinnaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādinnam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca
